result.execSummary:
The defendant Stacy M. Larrabee was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay County Appointed Attorney Fees TBD.
AMENDED 10-11-2016:  County Appointed Attorney Fees ordered in the amount of $413.00.  Funds on deposit be applied to County Appointed Attorney Fees first.

No violations of law.
Provide a DNA sample.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Order for Compensation of Court Appointed Atty.  Ordered that $413.00 be allowed to said atty as compensation of his professional service and disbursements, said sums to be paid to said Atty. by Pepin County and Pepin County shall be reimbursed by defendant as previously ordered.
Petition for Payment of County Appointed Attorney Fees

Defendant Stacy M. Larrabee in court with attorney Allan L Morgan.   appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant of charge/max. penalties. Defendant pleads guilty.  PLQ/WR form filed with the court and reviewed with defendant. Court finds defendant's waiver of her constitutional rights & plea done knowingly & voluntarily, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty.  Court withholds sentence and places defendant on 1 yr. probation with condition:  no violations of law; provide a DNA sample; pay costs and county appt'd atty fees.  Money on hand will be applied to atty fees first, any remaining be applied towards costs; defendant continue making $100/mo. payments until paid.  Advised of appeal rights.
Status conference on September 26, 2016 at 10:15 am.

Defendant Stacy M. Larrabee in court with attorney Allan L Morgan.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel requests another date, discussion regarding settlement.  Referred to scheduling clerk.
Status conference on September 6, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Stacy M. Larrabee in court with attorney Allan L Morgan.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel rec'd discovery, requests date in mid August.  Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection

Defendant Stacy M. Larrabee in court with attorney Allan L Morgan.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant of charges/max. penalties and rights.  NGP entered.  Status conference scheduled for July 5, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Order Appointing Counsel.  Ordered that Attorney Allan Morgan is appointed to represent the defendant as defense counsel.
Further Ordered That the defendant shall reimburse the County by monthly installments of $100.00 per month commencing June 1, 2016, subsequent payments due the same day of each and every month thereafter.
Failure to make scheduled payments without a showing by the defendant of good cause shall be contempt of court punishable under Ch. 785, Wis. Stats. and the Court shall do any of the following:  See Order

Defendant Stacy M. Larrabee in court.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court confirms defendant received copy of criminal complaint, advises of charge/max. penalties and rights.  Defendant requests County Appt'd Atty.  Court will appoint an attorney and defendant repay the county at rate of $100/mo. com. 6/1/16.  State notes defendant's a felon and requests $1000 Sign. Bond.  Court sets $1000 Sign. Bond with standard conditions.
